venue.address_1: 4 Fort Hill Road (Corner of Route 6A and Fort Hill Road
venue.name: Path to Vibrant Health

item.description:
Cape Cod Raw Food Meetup

presents

Crazy Sexy Cancer

A story about looking
for a cure
and find a life

featuring Kris Carr



Wednesday, August 15

6:00pm

Where: 4 Fort Hill Road, East Sandwich, MA

(Corner of Route 6A and Fort Hill Rd.)


6:00 PM: Potluck -Plant-based organic dish if possible and unprocessed food. If you cannot join us for the potluck, then join us for the movie.

6:45PM: Announcements

7:00 PM: DVD: Crazy Sexy Cancer
Discussion following film


FEE: $10.

RSVP: Sign up here to R.S.V.P. Space limited

Questions: Dorothy Torrey 508-888-6677

To learn more, visit: www.PathToVibrantHealth.com


An inspirational story about transformation in the face of adversity.
Diagnosed with a rare, incurable cancer, 31 year-old actress/ photographer Kris Carr exits her career and dives head-first into an epic journey, becoming a "full-time healing junkie." What follows is a four year adventure of mind, body and heart as Kris explores a colorful variety of treatments, both east and west. Along the way she meets four other people, her posse of soul-sisters, who refuse to be defined by the big "C".

Our Meetups are open to all - the curious and the transitional. We enjoy the camaraderie and the good food.
item.name: Meetup: Crazy Sexy Cancer featuring Kris Carr - Movie, Potluck and Discussion
